title: Xbox Marries Game Pass and xCloud - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.16.20
description:
Microsoft's doing it! Come listen to Blessing and Greg discuss Xbox's marriage made in heaven and Phil Spencer's rallying cry! 

Time Stamps - 
 00:00:00 - Start
00:05:50 - Housekeeping
The Kinda Funny Xcast kicks off Saturday at 6 am PT on youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services. Get your questions in now on kindafunny.com/patreon!
kindafunny.com/store has a bunch of great shit
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:07:30 - Xcloud getting Xbox Game Pass Library!
00:21:25 - With Phil Spencer announcing that xCloud would be free to Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscribers in September, it had me thinking, how could Stadia even hope to compete with this? - Best Friends Q:Benjamin Berry
00:43:40 - With the inclusion of Project Xcloud in Game Pass Ultimate, is there parity in those libraries? Is Project Xcloud getting it's own library that is separate from Game Pass Ultimate for those who aren't subscribed? - Best Friends Q:Scoompoof
00:49:33 - Halo: Infinite and XCloud are coming to GamePass. How the hell can Microsoft afford this? - Best Friends Q:Gondors Condor
00:53:57 - BEYOND LIGHT RELEASE WINDOW UPDATE
00:56:00 - Unsolved Mysteries: Why Dr Disrespect was banned
01:00:25 - TinyBuild Nabs Hello Neighbor Dev
01:01:10 -  KFG
01:01:50 - Out today
01:06:35 - Squad Up:Mark Freeman(Zoom/Twitter) - theindieboy1
01:07:15 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Greg
